+chatwheel2.description: Opens the second chatwheel menu while held

+herochatwheel.description: Opens hero chatwheel menu while held

Test_Checkpoint.description: Indicate to a test script that a checkpoint has been reached

Test_ExitProcess.description: Test_ExitProcess <exit code> - immediately kill the process.

Test_Loop.description: Test_Loop <loop name> - loop back to the specified loop start point unconditionally.

Test_LoopCount.description: Test_LoopCount <loop name> <count> - loop back to the specified loop start point the specified # of times.

Test_LoopForNumSeconds.description: Test_LoopForNumSeconds <loop name> <time> - loop back to the specified start point for the specified # of seconds.

Test_RandomChance.description: Test_RandomChance <percent chance, 0-100> <token1> <token2...> - Roll the dice and maybe run the command following the percentage chance.

Test_StartLoop.description: Test_StartLoop <loop name> - Denote the start of a loop. Really just defines a named point you can jump to.

addip.description: Add an IP address to the ban list.

ai_debug_dyninteractions.description: Debug the NPC dynamic interaction system.

ai_debug_los.description: NPC Line-Of-Sight debug mode. If 1, solid entities that block NPC LOC will be highlighted with white bounding boxes. If 2, it'll show non-solid entities that would do it if they were solid.

ai_expression_frametime.description: Maximum frametime to still play background expressions.

ai_expression_optimization.description: Disable npc background expressions when you can't see them.

ai_use_visibility_cache.description: Sets whether or not NPCs can cache their Visibility checks against other entities. If set to 2, also tests to make sure that NPC->Target results match that of Target->NPC.

ai_use_visibility_cache_reciprocation.description: Sets whether or not the visibility check cache should be reciprocal.

anim_resource_validate_on_load.description: Validates the animation group channel list against the animations on load for every animation

anim_showmainactivity.description: Show the idle, walk, run, and/or sprint activities.

animevents_dump.description: List all the currently registered anim events.

animgraph_debug_filterent.description: Filter setting for animgraph_debug_variables output. If set to -1, show debug for all entities. If set to 0, show debug for any NPCs that have been npc_selected. If set to >0, something other than 0, show debug for the entity with the matching entindex.

animgraph_debug_set_filter_params.description: Comma separated list of params to filter against when drawing debug text overlays

animgraph_debug_set_filter_tags.description: Comma separated list of tags to filter against when drawing debug text overlays

animgraph_debug_variables.description: Turn on to see animgraph variable changes for entities passing animgraph_debug_filterent.

animgraph_debug_variables_ignore_missing.description: If set, animgraph_debug_variables won't show debug for warnings about sets to missing variables.

animgraph_debug_variables_ignore_nonchan.description: If set, animgraph_debug_variables won't show debug for variable sets that don't change the value.

animgraph_footlock_auto_ledge_detection.description: Attempt to detect when the foot is partially hanging off a ledge and stop it tilting to reach the bottom

animgraph_footlock_auto_stair_detection.description: Attempt to detect when the foot is on a stair and will stop it from tilting to reach the next step

animgraph_footlock_enabled.description: A master convar that effectively disables the entire footlock node.

animgraph_footlock_trace_ground_enabled.description: Convar for toggling foot lock ground tracking.

animgraph_record_all.description: Automatically start recording AnimGraphs when they get created, and save them to disk when they are destroyed

assetbrowser_name_filter_delay.description: Millisecond delay between typing in the assetbrowser filter and the filter being applied

assetsystem_check_compile_state.description: Perform a detailed check of an asset's compile state

assetsystem_count.description: Find the number of assets registered with the asset system

assetsystem_debug_substring.description: Spew info for assets that match the specified substring

assetsystem_dump_string_threshold.description: Max length of strings to dump in assetsystem_dump_table

assetsystem_legacy_explicit_reload_child.description: Whether to explicitly reload child resources of a QueueReloadIfLoaded

assetsystem_legacy_process_file_changes_.description: Use old behavior of calling ProcessFileChanges() immediately after recompiling a resource

assetsystem_old_loop_algorithm.description: Set to true to revert to old behavior

assetsystem_quiet_inputs_before_recompil.description: Before triggering a resource recompile, wait for input dependencies to stop being written
Max amount of time to wait (in ms) for input dependencies to stop being written before abandoning the compile

assetsystem_quiet_inputs_before_reload.description: Before triggering a resource reload, wait for input dependencies to stop being written

assetsystem_reload_queue_requeue_pause.description: Time (sec) to pause assetsystem reload behavior if a requeue is requested

assetsystem_stats.description: Information about the current assetsystem database.

assetsystem_test_resort.description: (Dev command - regenerate the asset sort indicies)

assetthumbnail_old_fingerprint_style.description: Set to true to revert to old behavior

autosave_fully_async.description: Set to 1 to have autosaves execute completely on the save thread, forces 'render only' mode while the save completes

axis.description: Draw an axis  Arguments:  x y z pitch yaw roll <lifetime = 10.0> <r g b a>

banid.description: Add a user ID to the ban list.

banip.description: Add an IP address to the ban list.

battery_saver.description: OBSOLETE replaced by mobile_fps_* - Battery saver mode. 0=off, 1=on

benchframe.description: Takes a snapshot of a particular frame in a time demo.

binddefaults.description: Bind all keys to their default values.

bindss.description: Bind a key for a particular splitscreen player.

blink.description: Blink specified convar value between two values at the specified duration.

bot_mimic_spec_buttons.description: +attack, +jump etc are used for spectator control instead of being passed on to spectated bot

box.description: Draw a bbox  Arguments:  minx miny miny maxx maxy maxz <lifetime = 10.0> <r g b a>

buddha.description: Player takes damage but won't die

buddha_reset_hp.description: HP to set when damaged below zero in Buddha Mode

bugvoice_save.description: Write buffered voice attachment data to file.

button_info.description: Display information about the specified key or button.

cam_collision.description: When in thirdperson and cam_collision is set to 1, an attempt is made to keep the camera from passing though walls.

cam_idealdelta.description: Controls the speed when matching offset to ideal angles in thirdperson view

cam_ideallag.description: Amount of lag used when matching offset to ideal angles in thirdperson view

cam_showangles.description: When in thirdperson, print viewangles/idealangles/cameraoffsets to the console.

cc_captiontrace.description: Show missing closecaptions (0 = no, 1 = devconsole, 2 = show in hud)

cc_delay_time.description: Close caption delay before showing caption.

cc_findsound.description: Searches for soundname which emits specified text.

cc_lang.description: Current close caption language (emtpy = use game UI language)

cc_log.description: Log caption names and contents (0 = off, 1 = found captions, 2 = unfound captions, 3 = all captions)

cc_norepeat.description: In multiplayer games, don't repeat captions more often than this many seconds.

cc_showblocks.description: Toggles showing which blocks are pending/loaded async.

cc_subtitles.description: If set, don't show sound effect captions, just voice overs (i.e., won't help hearing impaired players).

cc_vr_caption_catchup_interval.description: Duration it takes for attached caption to ideal point

cc_vr_debug.description: Debug visualization of VR closed caption placement

cc_vr_depth_test.description: Have closed caption Panorama panel perform depth testing against the scene

cc_vr_epsilon.description: Epsilon to trigger movement of VR subtitle panel in world space

cc_vr_forward_offset.description: Subtitle offset distance (forward, in front of player)

cc_vr_vertical_offset.description: Subtitle vertical offset distance (positive is up)

chat_channel_debug.description: Print members of a chat channel

chat_say.description: Send a message to the specified channel

chat_sound.description: If enabled, play sound when receiving chat messages

chatwheel_say.description: Send a chatwheel message. Usage: chatwheel_say <messagenum>

check_nofilefd.description: Print the current number of FDs reported by getrlimit

cl_ShowBoneSetupEnts.description: Show which entities are having their bones setup each frame.

cl_async_usercmd_send_recvmargin_min.description: Min size of the recv margin queue when async usercmd send is disabled

cl_axis.description: Draw an axis  Arguments:  x y z pitch yaw roll <lifetime = 10.0> <r g b a>

cl_box.description: Draw a bbox  Arguments:  minx miny miny maxx maxy maxz <lifetime = 10.0> <r g b a>

cl_clock_correction.description: Enable/disable clock correction on the client.

cl_connectionretrytime_p2p.description: Number of seconds over which to spread retry attempts for P2P.

cl_cq_min_queue.description: Used by the client to inform the server of their desired queue length.  Derived from cl_tickpacket_recvmargin_desired and cl_tickpacket_desired_queuelength

cl_debug_build_recvmargin_min.description: Min size of the recv margin queue when in tools/debug mode

cl_debugoverlay_cycle_domain.description: Toggles visibility of the debug overlay system.

cl_debugoverlay_cycle_state.description: Toggles visibility of the debug overlay system.

cl_debugoverlay_dashboard.description: Makes the debug overlay dashboard visible.

cl_debugoverlay_toggle.description: Toggles visibility of the debug overlay system.

cl_demo_steadycam_deflection.description: if camera orientation changes this much update orientation

cl_demo_steadycam_enable.description: Stabilize camera orientation/position during demo playback.  1 == remove roll, 2 == steadycam

cl_demo_steadycam_radius.description: if camera moves this much from last anchor update anchor

cl_demo_view_offset_left.description: View offset during demo playback (+/- 1.25 is a good default for human average left/right eye offset)

cl_disconnect_soundevent.description: This soundevent is called to stop the desired soundevents when the game is disconnected.

cl_disconnect_voice_fade.description: This is a fade of current voices that is called when the game is disconnected. -1.f for no fade on disconnect

cl_dormant_spew.description: Spew state on when client entities become dormant or active.

cl_dota_alt_unit_movetodirection.description: Does holding alt enable move to direction mode?

cl_dota_gridnav_show_size.description: Control the size of the gridnav display. 1 = small, 2 = medium, 3 = large

cl_dota_speech_spec_ancientattack.description: Set to 0 to prevent hearing 'your ancient is under attack' lines.

cl_dota_speech_spec_barracksattack.description: Set to 0 to prevent hearing 'your rax is under attack' lines.

cl_dota_speech_spec_barracksfalls.description: Set to 0 to prevent hearing 'your rax has fallen' lines.

cl_dota_speech_spec_enemybasefalls.description: Set to 0 to prevent hearing 'enemy's tower/rax has fallen' lines.

cl_dota_speech_spec_idles.description: Set to 0 to prevent hearing announcers' idle lines.

cl_dota_speech_spec_towerattack.description: Set to 0 to prevent hearing 'your tower is under attack' lines.

cl_dota_speech_spec_towerfalls.description: Set to 0 to prevent hearing 'your tower has fallen' lines.

cl_drawcross.description: Draws a cross at the given location  Arguments: x y z

cl_drawhud.description: Enable the rendering of the hud

cl_drawline.description: Draws line between two 3D Points.  Green if no collision  Red is collides with something  Arguments: x1 y1 z1 x2 y2 z2

cl_dump_modifier_list.description: Dumps all modifiers that exist in the game

cl_dump_projected_texture_count.description: Print out number of active projected textures

cl_dump_response_symbols.description: print all response symbols to the console

cl_ent_absbox.description: Displays the total bounding box for the given entity(s) in green.  Some entites will also display entity specific overlays.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_actornames.description: Displays the entity name for all entities that have ShouldDisplayInActorNames true in code

cl_ent_animgraph2_open_graph.description: Opens the graph and starts live debugging the AG2 graph for a given entity  Arguments: entityName  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_animgraph2_record.description: Starts live debugging & recording the AG2 graph for a given entity  Arguments: entityName  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_animgraph_debug.description: Displays debug draws about the given entity(ies) animgraph  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_animgraph_record.description: Toggles recording of animgraph replay of the given entity(s)  Arguments: entityName automaticallyOpenInAnimgraphEditor  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_attachment_filter_substrings.description: If an attachment's name has any of the given substrings in it, it will be displayed. Substrings can be delimited by the ',' or '|' character.

cl_ent_attachments.description: Displays the attachment points on an entity.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_bbox.description: Displays the movement bounding box for the given entity(ies) in orange.  Some entites will also display entity specific overlays.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_call.description: ent_call <funcname> <option:entname> calls function on current look target or filtername, checks on ent, then root, then mode, then map scope

cl_ent_find.description: Find and list all entities with classnames or targetnames that contain the specified substrings. Format: find_ent <substring>

cl_ent_find_index.description: Display data for entity matching specified index. Format: find_ent_index <index>

cl_ent_grab.description: grabs the object in front of the player. Options: -loose -multiple -toggle

cl_ent_hierarchy.description: Prints the entity hierarchy tree rooted at the specified ent(s)

cl_ent_hitbox.description: Displays the hitboxes for the given entity(ies).  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_joint_filter_substrings.description: If a joint's name has any of the given substrings in it, it will be displayed. Substrings can be delimited by the ',' or '|' character.

cl_ent_joint_lines.description: Draw a line between a rendered joint and its parent.

cl_ent_joint_names.description: Draw the name of a rendered joint.

cl_ent_joints.description: Displays the joint names + axes an entity.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_messages.description: Toggles input/output message display for the selected entity(ies).  The name of the entity will be displayed as well as any messages that it sends or receives.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_picker.description: Toggles 'picker' mode.  When picker is on, the bounding box, pivot and debugging text is displayed for whatever entity the player is looking at.  Arguments: full - enables all debug information

cl_ent_pivot.description: Displays the pivot for the given entity(ies).  (y=up=green, z=forward=blue, x=left=red).   Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_remove.description: Removes the given entity(s)  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_remove_all.description: Removes all entities of the specified type  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name}

cl_ent_scale.description: Scales entities. Arguments: <scale factor> <{entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}>

cl_ent_scenehierarchy.description: Prints the entity scenenode hierarchy tree rooted at the specified ent(s)

cl_ent_script_dump.description: Dumps the names and values of this entity's script scope to the console  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_select.description: Select or deselects the given entities(s) for later manipulation  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_setname.description: Sets the targetname of the given entity(s)  Arguments:    <new entity name> <{entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}>

cl_ent_show_contexts.description: Show entity contexts in ent_text display

cl_ent_show_damage.description: Sets damage display mode.  When on, you will see the amount of damage dealt over the target's head.

cl_ent_skeleton.description: Displays the skeleton for the given entity(ies).  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_text.description: Displays text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_text256.description: Displays text debugging information about the given entity(ies) [within 256 units of the player] on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_text_clear.description: Hide text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_text_filter.description: Set which ent_text filters you want:

cl_ent_text_radius.description: Displays text debugging information about the given entity(ies) [near the player] on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)  2 Arguments:    <Radius> <{entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}>

cl_ent_text_sticky_add.description: Adds to list of names to display text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_text_sticky_clear.description: Clears the list of names to display text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_text_sticky_dump.description: Spews the list of names to display text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_text_sticky_remove.description: Removes from the list of names to display text debugging information about the given entity(ies) on top of the entity (See Overlay Text)  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_vcollide_wireframe.description: Displays the interpolated vcollide wireframe pm am entity.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_viewoffset.description: Displays the eye position for the given entity(ies) in red.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_ent_visibility_traces.description: Displays visibility traces for the given entity  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_entityreport.description: Reports all extant entities. Optional 2nd arg is a substring of a classname that the list will be filtered by.

cl_entitysummary.description: Summarizes (by class) all extant entities. Optional 2nd arg is a substring of a classname that the list will be filtered by.

cl_ents.description: List client entities, sorted by spawn group

cl_error_report_time.description: Minimum time in seconds that must elapse before printing prediction error summary. 0 to disable.

cl_extrapolate.description: Enable/disable extrapolation if interpolation history runs out.

cl_extrapolate_amount.description: Set how many seconds the client will extrapolate entities for.

cl_flushentitypacket.description: For debugging. Force the engine to flush an entity packet.

cl_force_missing_vcds.description: Force vcds to appear missing, and fall back to soundevents of the same name.

cl_frametime_summary_report_detailed.description: When a perf report is dumped at the end of the session, should it be detailed?

cl_groups.description: Show status of all spawn groups.

cl_hold_game_events_force_delay_ticks.description: Debugging convar to force late dispatch of game events.

cl_hold_game_events_until_server_tick.description: Holds game events until client has received the tick the event was fired on.

cl_ignorepackets.description: Force client to ignore packets (for debugging).

cl_imgui_debug_entity.description: Shows the entity browser, focused on the entity you specify.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cl_interp.description: Read the effective client simulation interpolation amount in terms of time.

cl_interp_animationvars.description: Interpolate LATCH_ANIMATION_BIT vars if interpolation interval is greater than simulation interval

cl_interp_hermite.description: Set to zero do disable hermite interpolation.

cl_interp_npcs.description: Interpolate NPC positions starting this many seconds in past (or the value as per cl_interp_ratio, if greater)

cl_interp_parallel.description: Run interpolation in parallel for entities with no children.

cl_interp_ratio.description: Sets the client simulation interpolation amount, in terms of server updates (final amount is cl_interp_ratio / cl_updaterate).

cl_interp_simulationvars.description: Interpolate LATCH_SIMULATION_BIT vars if interpolation interval is greater than animation interval

cl_interp_threadmodeticks.description: Additional interpolation ticks to use when interpolating with threaded engine mode set.

cl_interpolate_report.description: Enable to show interpolation profile timing

cl_jitter_bad_threshold_up.description: When upstream packet jitter in a frame exceeds this threshold (ms), the frame is considered to have 'irregular delivery'.  This is a derived value and should not be modified manually

cl_lagcompensation.description: Perform server side lag compensation of weapon firing events.

cl_latch_report.description: Enable to output stats about latching

cl_log_tick.description: Log when a tick is received

cl_log_tick_skips.description: Log when the tick delta >= this

cl_net_printsummary.description: Print a summary report of Source2 engine networking statistics.  (Ticks, netchan messages, etc.)

cl_net_showevents.description: Dump game events to console (1=client only, 2=all).

cl_panel_freeze_time_after_press.description: time to freeze mouse/pointer motion after a mouse button press

cl_panorama_script_help_2.description: Display all registered Panorama JavaScript bindings in wiki syntax

cl_panorama_typescript_declarations.description: Display Panorama JavaScript bindings as TypeScript declarations

cl_parallel_readpacketentities.description: Set to 1 to use threading snapshot reading (if game supports and server is sending bitcounts).

cl_parallel_readpacketentities_threshold.description: Use parallel processing of snapshot reading if above this many entries.

cl_particle_fallback_base.description: Base for falling back to cheaper effects under load.

cl_particle_fallback_multiplier.description: Multiplier for falling back to cheaper effects under load.

cl_particle_log_creates.description: Print debug message every time a particle collection is created

cl_particle_sim_fallback_base_multiplier.description: How aggressive the switch to fallbacks will be depending on how far over the cl_particle_sim_fallback_threshold_ms the sim time is.  Higher numbers are more aggressive.

cl_particle_sim_fallback_threshold_ms.description: Amount of simulation time that can elapse before new systems start falling back to cheaper versions

cl_particles_dumplist.description: Dump all new particles, optional name substring.

cl_particles_dumpsimlist.description: Dump all simulating particles, optional name substring.

cl_pdump.description: Dump info about this entity to screen.

cl_phys_debug_callback_entities.description: Print all entities that get touch callbacks. Each entity is printed only once.

cl_phys_sleep_enable.description: Enable sleeping for dynamic physics bodies.

cl_phys_sound_disable_impact_sounds_unde.description: if true, impact sounds wont play if no soft impact sound is present and the impact is below the hard velocity threshold.

cl_playback_screenshots.description: Allows the client to playback screenshot and jpeg commands in demos.

cl_poll_network_early.description: Enable polling for network messages every frame, instead of every tick

cl_portrait_bg_translucent_test.description: Renders the hero on a gray background for translucency blending testing

cl_pred_build_verbose.description: Verbose spew when building prediction optimized data runs.

cl_pred_optimize.description: Optimize for not repredicting if there were no errors

cl_pred_print_every_cmd.description: Print something every time we predict a command

cl_pred_track.description: <entindex> <fieldname>:  Track changes to entity index entindex, for field fieldname.

cl_prediction_savedata_postentitypacketr.description: Experimental optimization.  If you are reading this in 2026, please delete this convar.

cl_predictioncopy_print.description: Print simple description of prediction copy fields for entindex

cl_prop_debug.description: Toggle prop debug mode. If on, props will show colorcoded bounding boxes. Red means ignore all damage. White means respond physically to damage but never break. Green maps health in the range of 100 down to 1.

cl_querycache_stats.description: Display status of the query cache (client only)

cl_ragdoll_limit.description: Maximum number of ragdolls to show (-1 disables limit)

cl_removedecals.description: Remove the decals from the entity under the crosshair.

cl_resend.description: Delay in seconds before the client will resend the 'connect' attempt

cl_retire_low_priority_lights.description: Low priority dlights are replaced by high priority ones

cl_save_animgraph_recording.description: Saves all active animgraph recordings to disk  Arguments: automaticallyOpenInAnimgraphEditor

cl_sceneentity_debug.description: Display all thinking scene entities and its data.

cl_screenmessage_notifytime.description: How long to display screen message text

cl_script_add_debug_filter.description: Add a filter to the game debug overlay

cl_script_add_watch.description: Add a watch to the game debug overlay

cl_script_add_watch_pattern.description: Add a watch to the game debug overlay

cl_script_attach_debugger.description: Connect the vscript VM to the script debugger

cl_script_clear_watches.description: Clear all watches from the game debug overlay

cl_script_debug.description: Toggle the in-game script debug features

cl_script_dump_all.description: Dump the state of the VM to the console

cl_script_find.description: Find a key in the VM

cl_script_help2.description: Output help for script functions suitable for auto-completion

cl_script_reload_code.description: Execute a vscript file, replacing existing functions with the functions in the run script

cl_script_reload_entity_code.description: Execute all of this entity's VScripts, replacing existing functions with the functions in the run scripts

cl_script_remove_debug_filter.description: Remove a filter from the game debug overlay

cl_script_remove_watch.description: Remove a watch from the game debug overlay

cl_script_remove_watch_pattern.description: Remove a watch from the game debug overlay

cl_script_resurrect_unreachable.description: Use the garbage collector to track down reference cycles

cl_script_trace_disable.description: Turn off a particular trace output by file or function name

cl_script_trace_disable_key.description: Turn off a particular trace output by table/instance

cl_script_trace_enable.description: Turn on a particular trace output by file or function name

cl_script_trace_enable_key.description: Turn on a particular trace output by table/instance

cl_showanimstate.description: Show the (client) animation state for the specified entity (-1 for none).

cl_showdemooverlay.description: How often to flash demo recording/playback overlay (0 - disable overlay, -1 - show always)

cl_showerror.description: Show prediction errors, 2 for above plus detailed field deltas, 3 to filter out serverside known prediction errors, -entindex for specific entity.

cl_showfps.description: Draw fps meter at top of screen (1 = fps, 2 = smooth fps, 3 = server MS, 4 = Show FPS and Log to file )

cl_showmem.description: Draw approximate memory use at top of screen

cl_showpos.description: Draw current position at top of screen

cl_showtextmsg.description: Enable/disable text messages printing on the screen.

cl_showtick.description: Show current tick/time values.  Bitmask:  1='render time'  2='GameTime'   4=time of predicted entities  8=offset of predicted entities    (-1 means 'everything')

cl_skeleton_instance_smear_boneflags.description: Smear boneflags across the model.  Costs computation, but tests to make sure your bone flags are consistent.

cl_smooth.description: Smooth view/eye origin after prediction errors

cl_usercmd_max_per_movemsg.description: max number of CUserCmds to send in one client move message

cl_vsnd_morph_override_ease_enabled.description: Controls whether the compiled in vsnd morph data ease in/out values are used or values set from the convars (cl_vsnd_morph_override_ease_in, cl_vsnd_morph_override_ease_out) are used

cl_vsnd_morph_override_ease_out.description: If cl_enable_vsnd_morph_override_ease_enabled is true, ease out of vsnd morph driven animation over the specified number of seconds.

clearall.description: Clear console output from all views.

cli_ent_attachments.description: Displays the interpolated attachment points on an entity.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cli_ent_skeleton.description: Displays the skeleton for the given entity(ies).  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

cli_ent_vcollide_wireframe.description: Displays the interpolated vcollide wireframe pm am entity.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

crash.description: Crash the client. Optional parameter -- type of crash:  0: read from NULL  1: write to NULL  2: force an Assert  3: infinite loop  4: stack buffer overrun  5: multiple asserts across multiple threads. Optional number of threads (default 5)  6: looping memory leak until we're out of memory. Optional allocation size in bytes (default 1048576/1MB)

inspectheroinworld.description: Zoom into a selected hero in the world for a closer view.

instant_replay_goto_tick.description: Goto a direct timestamp of the replay

instant_replay_goto_tick_relative.description: Goto a direct timestamp of the replay

instant_replay_history_limit.description: Maximum amount of minutes to save history (0 is unlimited).

instant_replay_history_limit_low.description: Maximum amount of minutes to save history on low memory (32 bit) systems (0 is unlimited).

instant_replay_live.description: If in replay, jumps back to live

instant_replay_skip.description: Number of seconds to skip back to instant replay from current position

instant_replay_skip_live.description: Number of seconds to skip back to instant replay from live

iv_debug.description: Spew interpolated var info for entity.

iv_debugbone.description: Debug bone name for interpolation spew of CAnimationState.

iv_interp.description: Spew interpolated var info for entity.

iv_off.description: Turn off all interpolation variable spew.

iv_on.description: Spew both interpolated var debug info and history for entity.

joy_autosprint.description: Automatically sprint when moving with an analog joystick

joy_axisbutton_threshold.description: Analog axis range before a button press is registered.

joy_movement_stick.description: Which stick controls movement (0 is left stick)

joy_xcontroller_cfg_loaded.description: If 0, the 360controller.cfg file will be executed on startup & option changes.

joystick.description: True if the joystick is enabled, false otherwise.

key_findbinding.description: Find key bound to specified command string.

key_updatelayout.description: Updates game keyboard layout to current windows keyboard setting.

kickid.description: Kick a player by userid or uniqueid, with a message.

kickid_hltv.description: Kick a player by userid or uniqueid, with a message.

kill.description: Kills the player with generic damage

killvector.description: Kills a player applying force. Usage: killvector <player> <x value> <y value> <z value>

lb_allow_time_sliced_shadow_map_renderin.description: Allow time-sliced shadow buffer rendering when enabled via gameinfo.gi

lb_barnlight_shadowmap_scale.description: Scale for computed barnlight shadowmap size

lb_csm_cascade_size_override.description: Override width/height of individual cascades in the CSM

lb_csm_override_staticgeo_cascades.description: Override Cascades that will render static objects with lb_csm_override_staticgeo_cascades_value

lb_csm_override_staticgeo_cascades_anima.description: If lb_csm_override_staticgeo_cascades, ensure only objects without animated verts, i.e. SCENEOBJECTFLAG_CAN_RENDER_INTO_SST flag will be excluded (as opposed to all static objects).

lb_csm_override_staticgeo_cascades_value.description: If lb_csm_override_staticgeo_cascades, override value used to determine which cascades render static objects

lb_csm_receiver_plane_depth_bias.description: Shader depth bias applied to shadow receiver (Note this conflicts with renderstate depth bias, both now default to 0)

lb_csm_receiver_plane_depth_bias_transmi.description: Depth bias applied to shadow receiver for transmissive backface geo (based on renderstate depthbias being 0)

lb_dynamic_shadow_penumbra.description: Adjust shadow penumbra based on light size

lb_dynamic_shadow_resolution_base.description: Base resolution for dynamic shadowmap sizing.  Shadowmap size of a screen sized light

lb_dynamic_shadow_resolution_quantizatio.description: Quantization of dynamically computed shadow size

lb_enable_shadow_casting.description: Allow stationary/dynamic lights to cast shadows.

lb_shadow_map_cull_empty_mixed.description: Don't render shadows for mixed shadowmaps with no dynamics objects in view

lb_shadow_texture_height_override.description: Override height of shadow atlas texture

lb_shadow_texture_width_override.description: Override width of shadow atlas texture

lb_sun_csm_size_cull_threshold_texels.description: Size, in texels, where we will cull an object in the shadowmap

learn_refresh_item_sequence.description: Manually causes a refresh of the item sequence

listRecentNPCSpeech.description: Displays a list of the last 5 lines of speech from NPCs.

listip.description: List IP addresses on the ban list.

locator_topdown_style.description: Topdown games set this to handle distance and offscreen location differently.

log.description: Enables logging to file, console, and udp < on | off >.

log_color.description: Set the color of a logging channel.

log_dumpchannels.description: Dumps information about all logging channels.

log_flags.description: Set the flags on a logging channel.

log_level.description: Set the spew level of a logging channel.

log_verbosity.description: Set the verbosity of a logging channel.

loop_dump.description: Print the listeners of the current loop mode

lrucache_reset_stats.description: Resets stats for the specified CUtlLRUCaches (or all if none specified)

lrucache_set_size.description: Sets the specified cache to the specified size

markup_group_ent_bbox.description: markup_group_ent_bbox <markup_group name> -> toggle ent_bbox for all members of the named markup group

markup_group_ent_text.description: markup_group_ent_text <markup_group name> -> toggle ent_text for all members of the named markup group

markup_group_spew.description: Spew all current markup groups and their members

mat_clearshadercache.description: Clears the shader cache used for dynamic shader compile.

mat_colcorrection_forceentitiesclientsid.description: Forces color correction entities to be updated on the client

mat_disable_dynamic_shader_compile.description: Reloads all shaders from vcs files until the next time mat_reloadshaders is called

mat_forcereloadshaders.description: Force reloads all shaders (skips MD5 check). Takes optional substrings of shader names to recompile as arguments.

mat_print_dead_materials.description: Print loaded materials that have no valid layers due to not supporting any of the modes in gameinfo.gi.

mat_print_error_materials.description: Print loaded materials that are using the error shader or material.

mat_print_expensive_materials.description: Print materials sorted by cost heuristic

mat_print_material_info.description: Print info about a specific material

mat_print_materials.description: Print loaded materials. Takes an optional substring as an argument.

mat_print_materials_unused.description: Print materials that have never been used

mat_print_shader_info.description: Print detailed info about a single shader. Takes a shader name (hero.vfx) as an argument.

mat_print_shaders.description: Print loaded shaders. Takes a substring as an argument.

mat_print_textures.description: Print loaded textures in alphabetical order. Takes an optional substring as an argument.

mat_print_textures_size.description: Print loaded textures in ascending size order. Takes an optional substring as an argument.

mat_print_textures_size_in_memory.description: Print loaded textures in ascending size order as they are in memory. Takes an optional substring as an argument.

mat_reinitmaterials.description: Reinitializes all loaded materials, reloading their shaders.

mat_reloadshaders.description: Reloads all shaders. Takes optional substrings of shader names to recompile as arguments.

mat_set_shader_quality.description: Force shader quality setting (valid values are 0 or 1)

mat_show_distance_field.description: 0=Off, 1=Visualize trace from camera, 2=Visualize occlusion, 3=Visualize far field trace from camera

mat_viewportscale.description: Scale down the main viewport (to reduce GPU impact on CPU profiling)

mem_dump.description: Dump memory stats to text file or <stdout>.

mem_test_each_frame.description: Run heap check at end of every frame

mem_test_every_n_seconds.description: Run heap check at a specified interval

mic_listen_while_nonfocused.description: Enables the ability for the mic to remain open if the window loses focus such as when a caster tabs out to adjust settings

midi_auto_connect_port.description: On init, attempt to connect to the device on this port

midi_connect_port.description: Attempt to open a connection on the passed port ( or 0 if not specfied ). Will close existing connection

midi_reset_notes.description: Send emergency Note OFF for all active notes on all channels

midi_status.description: Dump info about connected MIDI devices

midi_test_off.description: Send a test note OFF to the connected MIDI device

midi_test_on.description: Send a test note ON to the connected MIDI device

minimap_create.description: Does a bunch of work to create a minimap

mobile_fps_increase_during_charging.description: MOBILE_FPS_CONTROL: If true we increase framerate limit while charging

mobile_fps_increase_during_touch.description: MOBILE_FPS_CONTROL: If true we increase framerate limit during touch

model_combiner_dumpstats.description: Dump the stats for the model combiner manager.

movie_fixwave.description: Fixup corrupted .wav file if engine crashed during startmovie/endmovie, etc.

mp_allowspectators.description: toggles whether the server allows spectator mode or not

mp_disable_autokick.description: Prevents a userid from being auto-kicked

mp_fadetoblack.description: fade a player's screen to black when he dies

mp_forcecamera.description: Restricts spectator modes for dead players

mp_friendlyfire.description: Allows team members to injure other members of their team

mp_restartgame.description: If non-zero, game will restart in the specified number of seconds

multiunit_page_next.description: cycle to the next multiunit page

multiunit_page_prev.description: cycle to the previous multiunit page

nav_add_to_selected_set.description: Add current area to the selected set.

nav_add_to_selected_set_by_id.description: Add specified area id to the selected set.

nav_begin_deselecting.description: Start continuously removing from the selected set.

nav_begin_selecting.description: Start continuously adding to the selected set.

nav_clear_attribute.description: Remove given nav attribute from all areas in the selected set.

nav_clear_attributes.description: Clear all nav attributes of selected area.

nav_corner_adjust_adjacent.description: radius used to raise/lower corners in nearby areas when raising/lowering corners.

nav_create_indirect_connection.description: Create a connection between the selected area and the area pointed at by the crosshair.

nav_create_indirect_connection_from_to.description: Create a connection between the current 'from' and 'to' locations.

nav_create_indirect_connection_set_from.description: Set the 'from' location of an indirect connection.

nav_create_indirect_connection_set_from_.description: Set the 'from' location of an indirect connection to be the current edit pos of nav_edit.

nav_create_indirect_connection_set_to.description: Set the 'to' location of an indirect connection.

nav_create_indirect_connection_set_to_us.description: Set the 'to' location of an indirect connection to be the current edit pos of nav_edit.

nav_drag_selection_volume_zmax_offset.description: The offset of the nav drag volume top from center

nav_drag_selection_volume_zmin_offset.description: The offset of the nav drag volume bottom from center

nav_draw_limit.description: The maximum number of areas to draw in edit mode

nav_draw_mesh_grid.description: Draw the mesh's spatial grid structure around the edit cursor position.

nav_draw_mesh_offset.description: Vertical offset for drawing the mesh (useful for flat planes where the mesh is often a fixed offset from the physical ground

nav_edit.description: Set to one to interactively edit the Navigation Mesh. Set to zero to leave edit mode.

nav_end_deselecting.description: Stop continuously removing from the selected set.

nav_end_selecting.description: Stop continuously adding to the selected set.

nav_gen_agent_radius_buffer.description: Buffer to add to agent radius before passing to nav gen

nav_gen_jump_connection_min_overlap_rati.description: Minimum edge overlap required for jump connection consideration as a percentage of agent radius

nav_gen_oriented_angle_tol.description: Max abrupt orientation difference an NPC can tolerate when moving through the mesh (degrees).

nav_gen_oriented_max_region_range.description: Max orientation range allowed within a region before it gets further split.

nav_list_movable_meshes.description: List the movable meshes registered with the movable meshes manager.

nav_lower_drag_volume_max.description: Lower the top of the drag select volume.

nav_lower_drag_volume_min.description: Lower the bottom of the drag select volume.

nav_mark.description: Marks the Area or Ladder under the cursor for manipulation by subsequent editing commands.

nav_mark_attribute.description: Set nav attribute for all areas in the selected set.

nav_raise_drag_volume_max.description: Raise the top of the drag select volume.

nav_raise_drag_volume_min.description: Raise the bottom of the drag select volume.

nav_remove_from_selected_set.description: Remove current area from the selected set.

nav_select_allow_blocked.description: When selecting an area under nav_edit, allow area marked as blocked.

nav_select_area_id.description: Select nav area with matching ID.

nav_select_block_id.description: Select nav space block with matching ID.

nav_select_hull.description: Restrict area selection to areas that can support a hull of the given category

nav_select_radius.description: Adds all areas in a radius to the selection set

nav_select_with_attribute.description: Selects areas with the given attribute.

nav_set_movable_mesh_dormant_flag.description: Set the movable mesh dormant flag (0=active, 1=dormant)

nav_show_area_connections.description: Show connections to selected area when true

nav_show_potentially_visible.description: Show areas that are potentially visible from the current nav area

nav_split.description: To split an Area into two, align the split line using your cursor and invoke the split command.

nav_store_selected_set.description: Stores the current selected set for later retrieval.

nav_switch.description: Switches to navmesh for the specified spawngroup

nav_test_bfs_lattice_hex.description: Demonstrates searching hexagonal lattice over nav mesh.

nav_test_find_nearest.description: Calculate the nearest point on the navmesh to the trace point.  Uses selection from nav_select_hull.

nav_test_find_nearest_clear.description: Calculate the nearest point on the navmesh to the trace point.  Uses selection from nav_select_hull.

nav_test_find_random_connected.description: Demonstrates finding random points that are connected in the nav mesh to the start point.

nav_test_level_hull.description: Find entities that intrude into the nav mesh.  List those entities in console output, and display bounding boxes around them for a while.

nav_test_path.description: Calculate and draw a path from player/camera position to the test position.

nav_test_path_expansion_search.description: Extend nav_test_path by doing an expansion search on that path.  Convar value defines dist.

nav_test_path_lock_goal.description: Lock the pathfinding goal to the current intersection point.

nav_test_path_lock_start.description: Lock the pathfinding start to the current intersection point.

nav_test_path_opt.description: Enable path optimization for nav_edit_path paths.

nav_test_path_return.description: Calculate a return path from cursor position to the path calculated by nav_test_path.

nav_test_path_space.description: Should nav_test_path test 3d navigation?  1 = space to space, 2 = multi-modal space/ground

nav_toggle_deselecting.description: Start or stop continuously removing from the selected set.

nav_toggle_in_selected_set.description: Remove current area from the selected set.

nav_toggle_selected_set.description: Toggles all areas into/out of the selected set.

nav_toggle_selecting.description: Start or stop continuously adding to the selected set.

nav_unmark.description: Clears the marked Area or Ladder.

nav_validate.description: Level of validation for nav system.  Higher will be slower.

nav_volume_debug.description: Draw or print debug information about nav volume queries.

navspace_draw_changes_waters.description: Draw water volumes when they change

nb_command.description: Sends a command string to all bots

nb_debug.description: Debug NextBots.  Categories are: BEHAVIOR, LOOK_AT, PATH, ANIMATION, LOCOMOTION, VISION, HEARING, EVENTS, ERRORS.

nb_debug_filter.description: Add items to the NextBot debug filter. Items can be entindexes or part of the identifier of one or more bots.

nb_debug_history.description: If true, each bot keeps a history of debug output in memory

nb_delete_all.description: Delete all non-player NextBot entities.  Equivalent to script 'NextBotManager.DeleteAll(...)'

nb_force_look_at.description: Force selected bot to look at the local player's position

nb_freeze.description: Stop all NextBots from moving only

nb_move_to_cursor.description: Tell all NextBots to move to the cursor position

nb_select.description: Select the bot you are aiming at for further debug operations.

nb_warp_selected_here.description: Teleport the selected bot to your cursor position

net_async_job_random_sleep.description: Sleep randomly 0..net_async_job_random_sleep ms in the parallel server jobs; sleep is per job

net_captureculldata.description: Captures low-level data to replay path culling algorithm behavior in controlled unit test environment

net_connections_stats.description: Print detailed network statistics for each network connection

net_culloptimization.description: Enable optimization of slow path that makes HLTV CPU consumption high in AnimGraph-using mods. Will switch to this on by default soon.

net_fakejitter.description: Shortcut to set jitter net options.  Run with no arguments for usage.

net_fakelag.description: Shortcut to set both FakePacketLag_Recv and FakePacketLag_Send net options

net_fakeloss.description: Shortcut to set both FakePacketLoss_Recv and FakePacketLoss_Send net options

net_force_steamdatagram.description: If SDR connectivity is possible with gameserver, then always use it, even if GC selected to use ordinary UDP for this match.

net_limit_sv_recv_max_message_size_kb.description: Server will reject message larger than N kb

net_limit_sv_recv_segments_per_packet.description: Server will reject packets with more than N segments

net_limit_sv_recvbuffer_kb.description: Server will not buffer more than N kb from connected clients

net_limit_sv_recvbuffer_msg.description: Server will not buffer more than N messages from connected clients

net_max_message_process_count.description: Maximum number of messages to process from a client in a single frame (0 == no limit).

net_max_message_queue_size.description: Maximum number of messages to allow waiting in queue after processing; exceeding this disconnects the client. 0 == no limit

net_max_polymorphic_spew.description: Max polymorphic variants to spew when spewing a flattened serializer.

net_messageinfo.description: Display info about a message (by classname or id)

net_option.description: Get or set SteamNetworkingSockets options such as fake packet lag and loss

net_p2p_listen_dedicated.description: Should dedicated server listen for new-style P2P?

net_print_sdr_ping_times.description: Print current ping times to SDR points of presence, and selected route

net_public_adr.description: For servers behind NAT/DHCP meant to be exposed to the public internet, this is the public facing ip address string: ('x.x.x.x' )

net_qospacketloss_percentage_threshold.description: Spew a warning if packet loss percentage is above this threshold

net_restrict_showmsg_socket.description: If set, only net_showmsg spew for data inbound on this socket name e.g. client, server, etc.

net_showevents.description: Dump game events to console (1=client only, 2=all).

net_showmsg.description: Show incoming message: <0|1|2|name> where 1 == all and 2 == all except net_NOP

net_showpeaks.description: Show messages for large packets only: <size>

net_showreliable.description: Like net_showmsg, but only spew reliable messages

net_showudp.description: Dump UDP packets summary to console

net_spewcounts.description: Spew serializer counts, client only by default, specify server to spew server counts

net_stats_json.description: Output server networking statistics in json format

noclip.description: Toggle. Player becomes non-solid and flies.  Optional argument of 0 or 1 to force enable/disable

notarget.description: Toggle. Player becomes hidden to NPCs.

npc_destroy.description: Removes the given NPC(s) from the universe  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

npc_go_do_run.description: Set whether should run on NPC go

npc_go_max_distance.description: How far is the trace we shoot when using NPC Go

npc_kill.description: Kills the given NPC(s)  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

npc_select.description: Select or deselects the given NPC(s) for later manipulation.  Selected NPC's are shown surrounded by a red translucent box  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

open_asset.description: Opens an asset in it's primary editor of choice. Specify the full path to the asset from the mod directory.

openshop_category.description: opens shop from clicks on the world shop model, specific tab request

panorama_dispatch_event.description: Dispatch the event defined by the argument string. No creating panel is specified.

panorama_dump_symbols.description: <ESymbolType> Dump all of the symbols in the Panorama symbol table

panorama_focus_world_panels.description: when set request key focus when a world panel is enabled

panorama_generate_layout_xsd.description: Generate the Layout XML Schema Definition for the current run-time (types are dependent on which game DLL is running).

panorama_print_cache_status.description: Print internal panorama refcounts for every file

particle_test_create.description: Creates the named particle system where the player is looking.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

particle_test_destroy.description: Destroys all particle systems matching the specified name.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

particle_test_file.description: Name of the particle system to dynamically spawn

particle_test_start.description: Dispatches the test particle system with the parameters specified in particle_test_file,  particle_test_attach_mode and particle_test_attach_param on the entity the player is looking at.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

particle_test_stop.description: Stops all particle systems on the selected entities.  Arguments:    {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

phonemedelay.description: Phoneme delay to account for sound system latency.

phonemefilter.description: Time duration of box filter to pass over phonemes.

phonemesnap.description: Lod at level at which visemes stops always considering two phonemes, regardless of duration.

phys_debug_draw.description: Set up debug-draw of physics internal state

phys_joint_teleport.description: Teleport joint anchors if connected to world

phys_length_damping_ratio.description: Spring damping ratio for length constraint

phys_use_block_solver.description: Use block solving for constraint entities

physics_debug_entity.description: Dumps debug info for an entity

playdemo_scripted.description: Play a demo with an associated markup script.

player_debug_print_damage.description: When true, print amount and type of all damage received by player to console.

playvol.description: Play a sound at a specified volume.

pop_var_values.description: Restore previously pushed convars and config values

practice_password.description: Password used to filter private practice lobbies.

print_changed_convars.description: Prints all convars that have changed from their default value

print_model_bind_pose.description: Prints the bind pose of the specified model. Optionally limits to a particular bone and its parent chain, otherwise prints the entire skeleton.

prop_debug.description: Toggle prop debug mode. If on, props will show colorcoded bounding boxes. Red means ignore all damage. White means respond physically to damage but never break. Green maps health in the range of 100 down to 1.

prop_debug_collision.description: Highlights props based on their collision group: COLLISION_GROUP_PROPS(white), COLLISION_GROUP_INTERACTIVE_DEBRIS(green), COLLISION_GROUP_DEBRIS and will return to COLLISION_GROUP_INTERACTIVE_DEBRIS on sleeping(bright red), COLLISION_GROUP_DEBRIS permanently (dark red), COLLISION_GROUP_DEBRIS(blue), OTHER(grey)

prop_dynamic_create.description: Creates a dynamic prop with a specific .vmdl aimed away from where the player is looking.  Arguments: {.vmdl name}

prop_physics_create.description: Creates a physics prop with a specific .vmdl aimed away from where the player is looking.  Arguments: {.vmdl name}

props_break_max_pieces_perframe.description: Maximum prop breakable piece count per frame (-1 = model default)

pulse_list_graphs.description: List all the active pulse graph instances

pulse_open_graph_id.description: Open a specific graph instance by id

pulse_print_graph_execution_history.description: Prints the execution history of a graph by filename or instanceid

pvs_debugentity.description: Verbose spew for this entity when doing IsInPVS computation.

pvs_flowtype.description: Flow through spawn groups for vis (0 == default, 1 == always visible, 2 == never visible.

pwatchent.description: Entity to watch for prediction system changes.

pwatchvar.description: Entity variable to watch in prediction system for changes.

r_always_render_all_windows.description: Always force all engine & tools to render

r_aoproxy_cull_dist.description: Distance to cull the AO proxy as a factor of size

r_camerapos.description: Prints out the current camera position + orientation to the console

r_depth_of_field.description: 0 = off, 1 = Infinity Ward GPU Gems 3 ch 28, 2 = Gustafsson 2018 Reference, 3 = Gustafsson 2018 Precomputed Coc, 4 = Gustafsson 2018 Precomputed Coc and Depth

r_dota_always_reflect_refract.description: 1 = force setup of refrect / refact pipelines even when using cheap water

r_dota_bloom_compute_shader.description: Use compute shader for Bloom downsample

r_dota_fsr_enable_mip_bias.description: Apply negative mip bias when rendering with FSR.

r_dota_fsr_rcas_sharpness.description: RCAS sharpness when using FSR + RCAS upsample.

r_dota_fsr_upsample.description: 0 == bilinear upsampe, 1 == FSR upscample, 2 == FSR + RCAS upsample

r_dota_lowend_objects.description: 0 = Force disable, 1 = use video settings, 2 = force enable

r_draw_particle_children_with_parents.description: Draw particle children with parents (-1=use gameinfo, 0=no, 1=yes)

r_drawblankworld.description: Render blank instead of the game world

r_drawpanorama.description: Enable the rendering of panorama UI

r_drawtracers_firstperson.description: Toggle visibility of first person weapon tracers

r_dx11_debug_clean.description: Aggressively unbind bound resources to cleanup DX11 debug warnings.

r_dx11_software_cmd_lists.description: Enable Software Command lists for DX11 (Avoid using deferred contexts)

r_entpos.description: Moves the camera position + orientation to the named entity

r_fallback_texture_lod_scale.description: Scale factor for requested texture size (texture streaming) - used for geo that doesn't have a precomputed UV density measure

r_farz.description: Override the far clipping plane. -1 means to use the value in env_fog_controller.

r_force_engine_render_frame.description: Force a single render of the engine viewport.

r_force_no_present.description: Force the render device to not present frames.

r_force_zprepass.description: 0: Force z prepass off. 1: Force on. -1: Don't force

r_grass_density_mode.description: 0 = Density corresponds to blade existance, 1 = Density corresponds to blade height, 2 = Both 0 and 1

r_hero_debug_render_mode.description: Hero Debug Rendering: 0-off, 2-Grayscale full specular without normal maps, 3-Grayscale full specular with normal maps, 4-Grayscale with normal maps, 5-Desaturated, 6-Wireframe, 7-Shaded wireframe, 8-Wireframe overlay

r_light_probe_volume_debug_grid.description: Show LPV debug grid, 0: off, 1: closest only 2: closest and keep 3: all

r_light_probe_volume_debug_grid_bbox.description: Show LPV bounding box when debug grid is on, 0: off, 1: on

r_light_probe_volume_debug_grid_samplesi.description: sphere radius (world) for LPV debug grid

r_lightmap_set.description: Lightmap set to use, only works on map load

r_lightmap_size_directional_irradiance.description: Maximum lightmap resolution for directional_irradiance channel. -1 = use value of r_lightmap_size

r_low_latency.description: NVIDIA Low Latency/AMD Anti-Lag 2 (0 = off, 1 = on, 2 = NV-only, on + boost)

r_mapextents.description: Set the max dimension for the map.  This determines the far clipping plane

r_max_texture_pool_size.description: Upper limit on texture pool size.

r_nearz.description: Override the near clipping plane. -1 means use the default.

r_particle_debug_filter.description: Limit debug visualizations to substring match of effect name

r_particle_debug_force_simulation.description: -1 for all asleep, 1 for all awake

r_particle_max_detail_level.description: The maximum detail level of particle to create

r_particle_max_draw_distance.description: The maximum distance that particles will render

r_particle_max_size_cull.description: Particle systems larger than this in every dimension skip culling to save CPU.  They will be drawn anyway.

r_particle_min_timestep.description: A minimum on particle simulation time, particle simulation happening more frequently than this will lerp.

r_particle_multiplier.description: Render each particle system N times for perf testing
