spec_replay_review_sound.description: When set to non-0, a sound effect is played during Killer Replay

spec_replay_sound_fadein.description: Amount of time in seconds it takes to fade in the audio before or after replay

spec_replay_sound_fadeout.description: Amount of time in seconds it takes to fade out the audio before or after replay

spec_replay_victim_pov.description: Killer Replay - replay from victim's point of view (1); the default is killer's (0). Experimental.

spec_replay_winddown_time.description: The trailing time, in seconds, of replay past the event, including fade-out

spec_track.description: Tracks an entity in spec mode

spew_fonts.description: Spew information about font manager fonts

ss_voice_hearpartner.description: Route voice between splitscreen players on same system.

stash_grab_all.description: grab all items from the stash

stat_dropdown.description: Select a category in the spectator stats dropdown

stat_dropdown_cycle.description: Cycle through the stat dropdown categories in a specified direction (-1 = back, 1 = forward)

stat_dropdown_sort.description: Cycle through the stat dropdown sort methods

stats_collect_gpu.description: While doing stats_display, collect GPU perf counters. Used for stats_print_gpu.

stats_highlight_interval.description: Interval between hightlight screens in the transition stats panel

stats_print.description: Prints out perf statistics to the console, clears perf history

stats_print_gpu.description: Prints out GPU perf statistics to the console.  Requires stats_display > 0, and stats_collect_gpu = true.  Optional argument of CSV filename

steamaudio_customdata_dimensions_numrays.description: Number of rays to trace for estimating inside outside status of a probe.

steamlearn_data_submit_enable.description: Whether we should be submitting data to SteamLearn

steamlearn_inference_http.description: If we should use HTTP for inference queries

steamlearn_max_in_flight.description: Maximum number of steamlearn requests that we can have in flight at once

steamlearn_override_register_access_toke.description: Key for overriding datasource registration key

steamlearn_request_timeout_s.description: Timeout in seconds for backend requests

steamlearn_spew_um_times.description: If we should spew how long inferences take to complete

stickerbook_other_user_cache_time_s.description: Numer of seconds to cache other users' stickerbooks

stickerbook_self_cache_time_s.description: Numer of seconds to cache other users' stickerbooks

stopdemos.description: Stop looping demos (current demo will complete).

stopsoundscape.description: Stops all soundscape processing and fades current looping sounds

subclass_change.description: Changes the subclass of the given entity.  Arguments:    <new_subclass> {entity_name} / {class_name} / {entity_index} / {no argument = pick what player is looking at}

subclass_create.description: Creates an entity of the given subclass where the player is looking.

surfaceprop.description: Reports the surface properties at the cursor

sv_allchat.description: Players can receive all other players' text chat, no death restrictions

sv_alltalk.description: Players can hear all other players' voice communication, no team restrictions

sv_autosave.description: Set to 1 to autosave game on level transition. Does not affect autosave triggers.

sv_bounce.description: Bounce multiplier for when physically simulated objects collide with other objects.

sv_client_max_interp_ratio.description: This can be used to limit the value of cl_interp_ratio for connected clients (only while they are connected).

sv_client_min_interp_ratio.description: This can be used to limit the value of cl_interp_ratio for connected clients (only while they are connected).

sv_client_predict.description: This can be used to force the value of cl_predict for connected clients (only while they are connected).    -1 = let clients set cl_predict to anything     0 = force cl_predict to 0     1 = force cl_predict to 1

sv_clockcorrection_msecs.description: The server tries to keep each player's m_nTickBase withing this many msecs of the server absolute tickcount

sv_cluster.description: Data center cluster this server lives in.

sv_condense_late_buttons.description: When condensing late commands. Should we compress multiple moves of button presses into the target move?

sv_cq_trim_bloat_remainder.description: When trimming a bloated CQ, leave at least N more commands than the minimum

sv_cq_trim_bloat_space.description: When trimming a bloated CQ, try to leave room for N more commands to be added.  0 will trim only what is needed to remove the immediate bloat, a very large value will reset the whole queue.

sv_cq_trim_catchup_remainder.description: When trimming an overful CQ due to app 'catchup' request, leave at least N more commands than the minimum

sv_debug_client_not_in_pvs.description: If set, draw failed client PVS checks with red box

sv_decal_clear_from_entity.description: Clears decals from the targetted entity

sv_deltaticks_enforce.description: By default, player must ack delta ticks in order. How to enforce it: 2 = kick all clients, 1 = kick only TV clients, 0 = do not kick.

sv_deltaticks_log.description: Whether diagnostic logging is enabled when clients ack delta ticks out of order. Policy: 2 = log all out of order acks, 1 = log only when disconnect is triggered, 0 = do not log.

sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_max.description: When encoding entity deltas, append on a random number of extra bytes.  This happens after sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_min_size.

sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_min.description: When encoding entity deltas, append on a random number of extra bytes.  This happens after sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_min_size.

sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_min_size.description: When encoding entity deltas, if the delta size is < N bytes, then shove in N dummy bytes.  This happens before sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_min/sv_dev_entitydeltapadding_extra_max

sv_dev_simulate_gcdown.description: <state> Turn on/off simulated GC communications failure (GC is down in a way that we know it is down)

sv_disable_reliable_delta_retransmit.description: Assume that a reliable entity delta will be ack'ed and send future deltas relative to the last reliable delta.

sv_dota_custom_game_cache_download_stuck.description: We must download N megabytes within sv_dota_custom_game_cache_download_stuck_timeout seconds, or else we'll assume the download is stuck and give up
Every N seconds, we must make download progress of at least sv_dota_custom_game_cache_download_stuck_mb megabytes, or else we'll assume the download is stuck and give up

sv_dota_custom_game_cache_download_timeo.description: If we cannot finish downloading after N seconds, give up

sv_dota_custom_game_cache_lock_file_time.description: If we cannot acquire lock on shared cache in N seconds, give up and fail UGC install

sv_dota_custom_game_cache_shared_folder.description: Shared cache for downloaded custom game data.  (Dedicated server only)

sv_dota_custom_game_cache_test_download.description: <custom game ID> [<expected_timestamp>].  Test code to cache UGC to dedicated server

sv_dota_speech_announcer_networking.description: Set to 0 to prevent announcer speech from being matched on the client; match it on the server instead, like the old way.

sv_enable_alternate_baselines.description: Allow alternate baseline system, set to 2 for debugging spew.

sv_enable_delta_packing.description: When enabled, this allows for entity packing to use the property changes for building up the data. This is many times faster, but can be disabled for error checking.

sv_ents_write_alarm.description: Print callstack every time CNetworkGameServerBase::WriteEntityUpdate takes more than this amount of milliseconds

sv_extra_client_connect_time.description: Seconds after client connect during which extra frames are buffered to prevent non-delta'd update

sv_filterban.description: Set packet filtering by IP mode

sv_fullupdate.description: Force a full update for all clients.

sv_gameinstructor_disable.description: Force all clients to disable their game instructors.

sv_gameinstructor_enable.description: Force all clients to enable their game instructors.

sv_hibernate_postgame_delay.description: # of seconds to wait after final client leaves before hibernating.

sv_hibernate_when_empty.description: Puts the server into extremely low CPU usage mode when no clients connected

sv_hoststate_quit_syscall.description: When enabled, game server will quit immediately via syscall instead of running host states shutdown sequence

sv_infinite_ammo.description: Player's active weapon will never run out of ammo

sv_lagcomp_filterbyviewangle.description: If true, player pawn will filter lag compensation targets by their view angle.

sv_lagcompensationforcerestore.description: Don't test validity of a lag comp restore, just do it.

sv_lan.description: Server is a lan server ( no heartbeat, no authentication, no non-class C addresses )

sv_late_commands_allowed.description: Allow N late commands to run at 0 timescale prior to running an on-time command. Negative values for network round trip based calculation with a hard cap of the of absolute value

sv_listen_directudp.description: Server will listen for direct UDP connections on the configured port.  This can be turned off to only listen for P2P/SDR connections.

sv_log_onefile.description: Log server information to only one file.

sv_logbans.description: Log server bans in the server logs.

sv_logblocks.description: If true when log when a query is blocked (can cause very large log files)

sv_logecho.description: Echo log information to the console.

sv_logfile.description: Log server information in the log file.

sv_logflush.description: Flush the log file to disk on each write (slow).

sv_logsdir.description: Folder in the game directory where server logs will be stored.

sv_long_frame_ms.description: If a server frame takes longer than N ms, complain about it.  (Dedicated server only.)  See also engine_frametime_warnings_enable.

sv_matchperfstats_maxclientperfsamples.description: Don't retain more than N perf samples for any given client

sv_max_queries_sec.description: Maximum queries per second to respond to from a single IP address.

sv_max_queries_sec_global.description: Maximum queries per second to respond to from anywhere.

sv_max_queries_window.description: Window over which to average queries per second averages.

sv_max_unreliable_delta_size.description: Maximum allowable entity delta size over unreliable delivery.

sv_maxrate.description: Max bandwidth rate allowed on server, 0 == unlimited

sv_maxunlag_player.description: If >0, maximumum lag compensation used for other human pawns. Applied after sv_maxunlag!

sv_maxupdaterate.description: Maximum updates per second that the server will allow

sv_maxvelocity.description: Maximum speed any ballistically moving object is allowed to attain per axis.

sv_memlimit.description: If set, whenever a game ends, if the total memory used by the server is greater than this # of megabytes, the server will exit.

sv_merge_changes_after_tick_with_calcdel.description: This fixes bugs where pure calcdelta is used due to recipient changing but it doesn't pick up a field change where the value was changed back to same value as the from snapshot even though the destination fields change list does note the change. Set to 2 to spew any changes merged in by this fix.

sv_metaduplication.description: Check serializer meta for duplication, add verbose to command for full spew

sv_minrate.description: Min bandwidth rate allowed on server, 0 == unlimited

sv_minupdaterate.description: Minimum updates per second that the server will allow

sv_mover_maxslope.description: The maximum slope the player can overcome [-]

sv_mover_pogodampingratio.description: The capsule pogo stick damping ratio [-]

sv_networkvar_perfieldtracking.description: Track individual field offset changes, rather than a single dirty flag for the whole entity.

sv_networkvar_validate.description: Validate each StateChanged against known offsets.

sv_noclipduringpause.description: If cheats are enabled, then you can noclip with the game paused (for doing screenshots, etc.).

sv_packstats.description: Show entity packing stats, pass 'clear' as argument to reset counts.

sv_parallel_checktransmit.description: Set to 1 to use threaded checkentities for transmit/pvs on listen servers, 2 for dedicated servers.

sv_parallel_packentities.description: Set to 1 to use threaded snapshot sending on listen servers, 2 for dedicated servers.

sv_parallel_sendsnapshot.description: 0: run all send jobs on main thread; 1: send jobs run asynchronously (except on dedicated server); 2: send jobs asynchronously; 3: send jobs run in parallel but block to not overlap the next tick; 4: main server clients' send jobs run in parallel, then HLTV server jobs; this approximately matches pre-async profile for a single HLTV server configuration

sv_password.description: Server password for entry into multiplayer games

sv_pause_on_console_open.description: 1 = Pause the game when pressing ~ to open the console. CTRL+~ opens the console without pause.

sv_phys_async_buoyancy_update.description: If true, server buoyancy motion controllers are updated in an async job after the tick has completed.

sv_phys_debug_callback_entities.description: Print all entities that get touch callbacks. Each entity is printed only once.

sv_phys_sleep_enable.description: Enable sleeping for dynamic physics bodies.

sv_phys_sound_disable_impact_sounds_unde.description: if true, impact sounds wont play if no soft impact sound is present and the impact is below the hard velocity threshold.

sv_pvs_entity.description: If set, only allows this ent index to network (other than players and things that force sending).

sv_pvs_max_distance.description: if set, adds a maximum range to PVS/PAS checks

sv_pvs_random.description: If set, objects blink in/out of pvs randomly.

sv_querycache_stats.description: Display status of the query cache (client only)

sv_rcon_banpenalty.description: Number of minutes to ban users who fail rcon authentication

sv_rcon_maxfailures.description: Max number of times a user can fail rcon authentication before being banned

sv_rcon_minfailures.description: Number of times a user can fail rcon authentication in sv_rcon_minfailuretime before being banned

sv_rcon_minfailuretime.description: Number of seconds to track failed rcon authentications

sv_recipients_check.description: When packing entities, check that recipient bits match for fast path packing.

sv_recvbuf_messages.description: Max number of messages that can be queued in a netchan receive buffer for an ordinary connection from a client.

sv_regeneration_force_on.description: Cheat to test regenerative health systems

sv_region.description: The region of the world to report this server in.

sv_replay_group_id.description: The replay group that this server will be uploading files to

sv_reserve_slots_for_reconnecting_player.description: Kick a previously connected player with the same steamID if a replacement comes along

sv_setsteamaccount.description: token Set game server account token to use for logging in to a persistent game server account

sv_showlagcompensation.description: If > 0, show lag compensated hitboxes whenever a player is lag compensated. Value is for how long.

sv_shutdown.description: Sets the server to shutdown when all games have completed

sv_shutdown_immediately_on_request.description: The server will always shutdown on receiving the shutdown request, even if not hibernating

sv_skyname.description: Current name of the skybox texture

sv_snapshot_unlimited.description: For debugging, don't throw away old snapshots so that if you break in debugger (on remote client or server) it won't require an uncompressed update to resume.  You may run out of memory of course...

sv_steamauth_enforce.description: By default, player must maintain a reliable connection to Steam servers. When player Steam session drops, enforce it: 2 = instantly kick, 1 = kick at next spawn, 0 = do not kick.

sv_steamauth_ignore_localhost.description: Ignore VAC and auth errors for client connected via localhost address or in-engine loopback

sv_steamgroup.description: The ID of the steam group that this server belongs to. You can find your group's ID on the admin profile page in the steam community.

sv_steamgroup_exclusive.description: If set, only members of Steam group will be able to join the server when it's empty, public people will be able to join the server only if it has players.

sv_stopspeed.description: Minimum stopping speed when on ground.

sv_stressbots.description: If set to 1, the server calculates data and fills packets to bots. Used for perf testing.

sv_strict_notarget.description: If set, notarget will cause entities to never think they are in the pvs

sv_tags.description: Server tags. Used to provide extra information to clients when they're browsing for servers. Separate tags with a comma.

sv_temp_baseline_string_table_buffer_siz.description: Buffer size for writing string table baselines

sv_timeout.description: After this many seconds without a message from fully connected client, the client is dropped

sv_timeout_when_fully_connected.description: Once fully connected, player will be kicked if he doesn't send a network message within this interval.

sv_timeout_when_fully_connected_customga.description: Once fully connected in a custom game game, player will be kicked if they don't send a network message within this interval.

sv_timeout_when_fully_connected_event.description: Once fully connected in an event game, player will be kicked if they don't send a network message within this interval.

sv_timeout_when_fully_connected_tourname.description: Once fully connected in a tournament game, player will be kicked if he doesn't send a network message within this interval.

sv_unpause_on_console_close.description: 1 = Unpause the game when pressing ~ to close the console. 0 = Leave the game paused.

sv_usercmd_custom_random_seed.description: When enabled server will populate an additional random seed independent of the client

sv_usercmd_execute_warning_ms.description: Emit a warning if we spend more than N ms executing user commands for a single player

sv_vac_webapi_auth_key.description: Key for when posting to vac related webapis.

sv_visiblemaxplayers.description: Overrides the max players reported to prospective clients

sv_voicecodec.description: Specifies which voice codec DLL to use in a game. Set to the name of the DLL without the extension.

sv_watchtransmit.description: Watch NetworkStateChanged info for this entity index.

sys_info.description: Print system information to the console

sys_minidumpspewlines.description: Lines of crash dump console spew to keep.

telemetry_message.description: Place a message in the telemetry timeline

telemetry_toggle_timespan.description: Starts/stops a timespan with an ever increasing name.

test_dispatcheffect.description: Test a clientside dispatch effect.  Usage: test_dispatcheffect <effect name> <distance away> <flags> <magnitude> <scale>  Defaults are: <distance 1024> <flags 0> <magnitude 0> <scale 0>

test_entity_blocker.description: Test command that drops an entity blocker out in front of the player.

test_shipping_assert.description: Generate an assert to test shipping assertion code

test_voice_containers.description: Quick example for how we'd derive traits from voice containers.

think_limit.description: Maximum think time in milliseconds, warning is printed if this is exceeded.

thirdperson_mayamode.description: Switch to thirdperson Maya-like camera controls.

timedemo.description: Play a demo and report performance info.

timedemoquit.description: Play a demo, report performance info, and then exit

toggle.description: Toggles specified convar value on and off.

top_bar_message.description: test top bar status message. usage: top_bar_message ['message here'] [scary: 0/1]

treasure_peek_details.description: Displays details about the peek status of the currently open treasure

tutorial_start_lesson.description: Jump to the passed tutorial lesson

tv_advertise_watchable.description: GOTV advertises the match as watchable via game UI, clients watching via UI will not need to type password

tv_allow_autorecording_index.description: When >=0 restricts autorecording only to the specified TV index

tv_allow_camera_man.description: Auto director allows spectators to become camera man

tv_allow_static_shots.description: Auto director uses fixed level cameras for shots

tv_autorecord.description: Automatically records all games as SourceTV demos.

tv_autoretry.description: Relay proxies retry connection after network timeout

tv_broadcast.description: Automatically broadcasts all games as GOTV demos through Steam.

tv_broadcast1.description: Automatically broadcasts all games as GOTV[1] demos through Steam.

tv_broadcast_keyframe_interval.description: The frequency, in seconds, of sending keyframes and delta fragments to the broadcast relay server

tv_broadcast_keyframe_interval1.description: The frequency, in seconds, of sending keyframes and delta fragments to the broadcast1 relay server

tv_broadcast_max_requests.description: Max number of broadcast http requests in flight. If there is a network issue, the requests may start piling up, degrading server performance. If more than the specified number of requests are in flight, the new requests are dropped.

tv_broadcast_max_requests1.description: Max number of broadcast1 http requests in flight. If there is a network issue, the requests may start piling up, degrading server performance. If more than the specified number of requests are in flight, the new requests are dropped.

tv_broadcast_resend.description: resend broadcast data to broadcast relay

tv_broadcast_spew_threshold.description: The threshold, in seconds, that we'll spew about the snapshot tick

tv_broadcast_startup_resend_interval.description: The interval, in seconds, of re-sending startup data to the broadcast relay server (useful in case relay crashes, restarts or startup data http request fails)

tv_chatgroupsize.description: Set the default chat group size

tv_chattimelimit.description: Limits spectators to chat only every n seconds

tv_clients.description: Shows list of connected SourceTV clients.

tv_deltacache.description: Enable delta entity bit stream cache

tv_dispatchmode.description: Dispatch clients to relay proxies: 0=never, 1=if appropriate, 2=always

tv_dota_auto_record.description: If enabled, a demo will automatically be recorded for every game

tv_dota_auto_record_stressbots.description: If enabled, a demo will automatically be recorded for stressbot games

tv_enable_delta_frames.description: Indicates whether or not the tv should use delta frames for storage of intermediate frames. This takes more CPU but significantly less memory.

tv_enable_dynamic.description: When enabled, changes in tv_enable convars cause immediate startup or shutdown of hltv server

tv_grouprelaydatareliable.description: When enabled, this will collect all information for relay sending into a single datagram to ensure that the data stays together through a potentially large number of relays

tv_grouprelaydataunreliable.description: When enabled, this will collect all information for relay sending into a single datagram to ensure that the data stays together through a potentially large number of relays

tv_grouprelaydatavoice.description: Similar to tv_grouprelaydata, but controls whether or not the voice channels should be routed into the grouped data for the relays

tv_include_usercommands.description: HLTV streams will include player usercommands each tick

tv_instant_replay_full_frame_build_threa.description: Build the full frames on a seperate job thread

tv_listen_voice_indices.description: Bitfield of playerslots to listen to voice messages from when connected to SourceTV, default is none

tv_listen_voice_indices_h.description: High 32 bits of bitfield of playerslots to listen to voice messages from when connected to SourceTV, default is none

tv_log_director_events.description: Log game events being considered by the director

tv_maxclients.description: Maximum client number on SourceTV server.

tv_maxclients_relayreserved.description: This number of relay client connections are reserved for SourceTV relays.

tv_maxrate.description: Max SourceTV spectator bandwidth rate allowed, 0 == unlimited

tv_mem.description: hltv memory statistics. Use with 'ent 10' (dump entity 10 memory usage) or 'top 8' (dump top 8 memory users) or 'class' CWorld (dump CWorld class)

tv_msg.description: Send a screen message to all clients.

tv_nochat.description: Don't receive chat messages from other SourceTV spectators

tv_overridemaster.description: Overrides the SourceTV master root address.

tv_password.description: SourceTV password for all clients of CSTV[0]

tv_password1.description: SourceTV password for all clients of CSTV[1]. If empty, tv_password is used

tv_playcast_delay_resync.description: To alleviate intermittent network connectivity problems, this is the number of seconds to wait before actually re-syncing the stream after failure

tv_playcast_fragment_cache_history_lengt.description: How far back before our current playback head in seconds to hold onto fragments.

tv_playcast_retry_timeout.description: In case of intermittent network problems, how long should playcast retry fragment retrieval before resorting to resync

tv_rate_multiplier.description: Multiply requested rate by this value to adjust Dota TV send rate

tv_record_immediate.description: tv_record starting the moment tv_record was executed, not tv_delay earlier

tv_relay.description: Connect to SourceTV server and relay broadcast.

tv_relay_quit_after_game.description: Quit after a game has been relayed, do not hibernate

tv_relay_secret_code.description: When enabled, this will use a uniquely generated server code to authenticate relay to relay connections. This code is coordinated via the GC or some external means rather than by clients directly

tv_secret_code.description: When enabled, this will use a uniquely generated server code to authenticate relay connections. This code is coordinated via the GC or some external means rather than by clients directly

tv_secure_bypass.description: Bypass secure challenge on TV port

tv_threaded_merge_entity_deltas.description: Enable SourceTV threading of delta merging

tv_title.description: Set title for SourceTV spectator UI

tv_transmitall.description: Transmit all entities (not only director view)

tv_update_hibernation_enabled.description: Allow SourceTV to control server hibernation state.

tv_window_size.description: Specifies the number of seconds worth of frames that the tv replay system should keep in memory. Increasing this greatly increases the amount of memory consumed by the TV system

ui_hud_dist.description: distance from the player to the hud

unpause.description: Clear the pause state of the server.

unsubscribe_all_game_modes.description: Unsubscribes from all custom games. They will be uninstalled by the Steam client when you close Dota 2.

unsubscribe_custom_game.description: Stops subscribing to a specific custom game. It will be uninstalled when you exit Dota 2.

url_execute.description: Executes url-based commands, used for incoming commands from url-based launches when the game's already running.

use_item_client.description: Use the item in the indicated slot. <hero name> <slot name>

users.description: Show user info for players on server.

vconsole_rcon_server_details.description: when non-empty allows for easy vconsole connection to the dedicated server.

vis_debug_drawcluster.description: Add cluster # to visualization, (-1) to clear

vis_debug_dumpvisibleclusters.description: Show the list of visible clusters

vis_debug_find_los.description: Find or clear the vis LOS to here

vis_debug_lock.description: Lock vis LOS origin to current

vis_debug_record_start.description: Record a path to debug vis

vis_debug_record_stop.description: Record a path to debug vis

vis_debug_sunclusters.description: Showing clusters for sun/csm rendering. Red (full sun csm & lighting), Orange (no viewmodel sun or csm), Green (no sun at all)

vis_debug_tracelos.description: Trace rays and check vis from the current camera

vmix_debug_list.description: Debug dump the list of available vmix graphs

vmix_output.description: Dump main graph control output values

voice_always_sample_mic.description: When enabled, open the voip audio input stream when the application launches.

voice_chat_bubble_show_volume.description: Visualize the volume transmitted with the icon displaying speech.

voice_chat_bubbles.description: Whether to draw chat bubbles int the UI or not

voice_device_override.description: Default device used for voice capture.

voice_input_stallout.description: Time before we consider a mic stalled out and need to reset it.

voice_sequence_maximum_wait_time.description: When receiving packets out of sequence, wait this many seconds for missing sequences to arrive

voice_threshold.description: decibel threshold for how loud the talker's input signal is before we think they are talking.

voice_vox.description: Voice chat uses a vox-style always on

voice_vox_current_peak.description: Current peak value (out of 64k) of the incoming voice stream

volume_fog_shadow_penumbra_multiplier.description: Penumbra size multiplier for shadow sampling, reduces fog shadow aliasing

vprof_dump_counters.description: Dump vprof counters to the console

vprof_generate_report.description: Generate a report to the console.

vprof_generate_report_budget.description: Generate a report to the console based on budget group.

vprof_generate_report_hierarchy.description: Generate a report to the console.

vprof_remote_start.description: Request a VProf data stream from the remote server (requires authentication)

vprof_remote_stop.description: Stop an existing remote VProf data request

vprof_reset.description: Reset the stats in VProf profiler

vprof_reset_peaks.description: Reset just the peak time in VProf profiler

vprof_scope_entity_clientthink.description: Set to 1 to generate individual VPROF nodes for each client entity's think function.

workshop_download_debug.description: Test different custom game download states

world_dump_loaded_worlds.description: Dump all of the worlds that we know about

world_layer_set_visible.description: Show or hide the specified world layer

writeid.description: Writes a list of permanently-banned user IDs to file.

writeip.description: Save the ban list to file.

writekeybindings.description: Saves current key bindings to disk.

zoom_sensitivity_ratio.description: Additional mouse sensitivity scale factor applied when FOV is zoomed in.
